Question

H1: µ1 = µ2 > µ3 H2: µ1 < µ2 > µ3

Below are two propositions. Which one(s) is/are correct?

A) These hypotheses can be tested in one test using null hypothesis testing. B) These hypotheses can be tested using model selection.


Answerlist

* Only proposition A is correct.
* Only proposition B is correct.

* Both statements are incorrect.
